name: Wreck-It Ralph unity
description:
Original release: 16/11/2015

ESP: No se trata de seguir la historia de la película,
sino de explorar libremente sobre sus mundos con
Rompe-Ralph y Vanellope.

ENG: This isn't to follow the story of movie,
but freely explore their worlds with Wreck-It-Ralph
and Vanellope.
